description:
Great Astoria location! Safe school zone, close to manhattan. Astoria is known for its convienent living with all NYC has too offer. The apartment has many amenities, including high-speed 5g unlimited internet, with cable including HBO & Showtime. A great place to relax and stay connected. 

You have everything you need within foot steps from your door 24 hours with many great restaurants. Astoria Park is just a few blocks away as well.
name: Astoria Queens  -Spacious Studio -Safe School Zone
